title: Group portrait of wedding party with five men, including groom Maurice L. Smith, Emmett H. Allen, best man Thomas Latimer, ushers George Gaines third from right and John F. Allen Jr., four women, including bride Ruth Louise Allen wearing fingerless gloves, pearl necklace, and satin and chiffon wedding gown, matron of honor Mrs. David Brown, and bridesmaids Arlene and Marjorie Allen Gaines, and flower girl Velma Jeanne Love, posed in Allen home, Hermitage Street, Homewood, another version
medium: black and white: Ansco Safety Film
